overview:
Mr. Michael Krupka is a Managing Director at Bain Capital Ventures. Prior to Bain Capital Ventures, Mr. Krupka was a Managing Director with the Private Equity Group of Bain Capital, during which time he focused his investing activities on technology and technology-driven companies, including software, hardware, database, and telecommunication services. Earlier at Bain Capital, Mr. Krupka was a Principal of Information Partners, a fund focused on early-stage information technology investing. He has also served in several operating roles as President of a $110 M revenue software company and CFO of a $70 M revenue services company. Prior to joining Bain Capital in 1991, Mr. Krupka was a consultant with Bain & Company.

In addition to his firm and portfolio responsibilities, Mr. Krupka also serves on the Boards of the Boys and Girls Club of Boston and MetroLacrosse.

Mr. Krupka has a BA in Chemistry from Dartmouth College.
